thread.section_title: Boro Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Long Island City, New York) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel. Clean, minimalist, industrial design.
thread.title_full: Great hotel. Clean, minimalist, industrial design. - Review of Boro Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: John P
title: Great hotel. Clean, minimalist, industrial design.
text: Always stay here when I visit the city for work. The hotel has a great feel, rooms are clean and comfortable. The staff is also great, especially Gloria, she works the bar/kitchen in the morning, and she is incredibly friendly, and a quick with her service. Never disappointed.
